title: Turkey men's national artistic gymnastics team
data: The Turkey men's national artistic gymnastics team represents Turkey in FIG international competitions. Aleko Mulos was the first ever Turkish man to compete at the Olympic Games, doing so in 1908.[1]  Turkey fielded their first Olympic team at the 2024 Olympic Games;[2] previously they had individual athletes compete at the 2016 and 2020 Olympic Games.[3]  At the 2020 Olympic Games Ferhat ArÄ±can became the first Turkish male gymnast to win an Olympic medal, earning bronze on the parallel bars.[4] This list includes all Turkish male artistic gymnasts who have won a medal at the Olympic Games or the World Artistic Gymnastics Championships.
